body:
I'm pretty sure the community and staff team are aware that all the Nexus rotations are currently broken, I saw this started yesterday and it hasn't been fixed yet..
I'm doing this here as this is temporary, no need to report it on GitHub..
Without further explanations, hope you fix this Kylo :)
Thanks!

title: KyloCode

replies.body:
Ye, I've seen it too. It sucks cause its a cool gamemode.
Btw, why have you called this post KyloCode?
